scripts.analyze:size: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const files=fs.readdirSync('build/static/js').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.js')).map(f=>{const s=fs.statSync(path.join('build/static/js',f));return{name:f,size:(s.size/1024).toFixed(2)+'KB'}}).sort((a,b)=>parseFloat(b.size)-parseFloat(a.size));console.log('Bundle Sizes:');files.forEach(f=>console.log(f.name.padEnd(40),f.size))"
scripts.analyze:html: npm run build && npx source-map-explorer 'build/static/js/*.js' --html bundle-analysis.html 2>&1 | findstr /V "source map refers to generated column" || npx source-map-explorer 'build/static/js/*.js' --html bundle-analysis.html
scripts.analyze:json: npm run build && npx source-map-explorer 'build/static/js/*.js' --json bundle-analysis.json --no-open 2>&1 | findstr /V "source map refers to generated column" || npx source-map-explorer 'build/static/js/*.js' --json bundle-analysis.json --no-open
scripts.analyze:simple: npm run build && echo Bundle File Sizes: && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path 'build/static/js/*.js' | Sort-Object Length -Descending | ForEach-Object { $size = [math]::Round($_.Length / 1KB, 2); Write-Host ('{0,-50} {1,10} KB' -f $_.Name, $size) }"
